name: Demon's Spire
description:
▶ Story
- The main character Sirius lost both his hometown and his family when he was young due to the dark power emitted by the tower of gray nightmares. Sirius, who went to the sword of revenge out of hatred for the devil, grew up to be a first-class devil hunter and left alone to the gray nightmare tower to avenge the disaster that took away his family 20 years ago.

▶ Game Mechanics
- The "parring" system, which bounces off monster attacks, is a key factor in fighting.
- Perfectly paring the monster's attack pattern allows you to experience rhythmical battles.
- Paring can shave the monster's stamina and turn the enemy into a stunted state.
- Insert a lot of confidential information to check the timing of the paring so that it doesn't feel unreasonable
